website_summaries.verdict: A durable and comfortable glove that really shines if you get in a lot of cold, wet rounds.
pros: Good quality that features Cabretta leather reinforced palm and thumb
Works very well in cold, wet conditions
cons: Sizing here is a little small, so consider buying up
The thumb area in particular is prone to weathering and holes

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and next day service!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value! Always get the gloves with the reinforced palm and thumb patch. They last 3 times as long. I prefer the FootJoy as it still works in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Probably for the experienced golfer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves, but they don't last a long time. I've bought gloves that lasted longer and were cheaper in the "no name" bin of my golf store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value good grip
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable glove that provides no slip. I have used this glove for many years and have found that they are durable and provide a great grip on the club. IMO best glove at this price that you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Kev & Tab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf gloves
customer_reviews.text: The fit and feel are terrific. I'm very satisfied with these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like the golf gloves; but find them a little tight. That's the challenge of buying gloves (and clothes in general) overall; not able to try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Bassman 17

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: They were what the recipient had on their wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Drimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great value when you want to buy 2 so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value when you want to buy 2 so that you always have a spare. Nothing is worse then golfing with a ripped glove.
customer_reviews.author: david moreno

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but bought as a gift for someone else. Use them myself also.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mingl

customer_reviews.title: It’s a golf glove
customer_reviews.text: It’s a golf glove does what it needs to do I would say it’s a little smaller to size but other than that looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Great golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Really good glove glove. Great price for a pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H

customer_reviews.title: Two rounds in, falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The material in the palm started to fall apart during the second round! At $13 each, one expects better quality. Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cadby

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of FJ shoes, shirts and gloves. You get what you pay for and with FJ it is top shelf quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F Combs

customer_reviews.title: Good Service!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived on time and was exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Senior64

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order for these gloves I've placed, my son really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: bizeemom

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves. Not as good as their high end glove but for the money, very little drop off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Katherine Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've always been able to count on the quality of these gloves. Never a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: R Henry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Wish they still had the ball marker but the gloves are great!
customer_reviews.author: mrwichser

customer_reviews.title: Product came as described and was in great condition gloves fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and was in great condition gloves fit as expected. I would purchase this product and do business with the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Ball markers
customer_reviews.text: Great product as expected, does include ball markers for those wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Carlo

customer_reviews.title: and other FJ medium gloves have always fit great. These
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the medium, and have studied the FootJoy website before, and printed out the size chart for hands. I should be a medium, and other FJ medium gloves have always fit great. These, however, are too large for my hands. I'm guessing this production batch was off a little, since I've never had a problem with FJ quality consistency in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CBZ

customer_reviews.title: Three strokes off! Better grip makes it!
customer_reviews.text: I believe he took three strokes off his game using these. Is it the fact the old glove was losing its grip on reality? Or he feels better playing with a classy fine piece of equipment such as this glove? Three strokes. That’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Came in already torn
customer_reviews.text: Glove came in with a slight hole in the area where the thumb and pieces meet. After one round of golf it’s already tearing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie W.

product_meta.title: New Improved FootJoy WeatherSof Mens Golf Gloves (2 Pack) - World #1 Golf Glove
feature_bullets: FiberSof palm and back for consistent comfortable fit.
Premium Cabretta leather thumb and palm patch.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
